text:
Hi everyone, we have a question regarding HubSpot CMS grids:

• From all the public documentation, we see that the grid specs are a *1170 grid* which is a bit narrow (1200 width)
• Is it possible to go wider than this grid for us to design and customize layouts on HubSpot CMS? Or is the 1170 grid below the only option?
Thank you in advance!
The dnd builder grid doesn’t have a fixed size — its width can be adjusted on a per-section basis. You can also adjust the grid’s gutters in your theme’s CSS.
Thank you very much for your response! This is helpful :slightly_smiling_face:
